name: Dave: Thought Patterns
description:
Let me introduce to you...

Dave: Thought Patterns

A game to be telling a tale of Dave and of his turbulent inner struggle to survive the depths of a broken mind.

Donations are a great way to support us creating games as we're currently unemployed.

The game will be for PC, Linux and MacOS, other platforms depend on stuff to come probably later in 2022.

At this phase of the development we're using some free to use assets from:
https://oisougabo.itch.io/free-platformer-16x16
https://ansimuz.itch.io/magic-cliffs-environment
https://andreecy.itch.io/td-character-animation
https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/?keyword=Kevin%20MacLeod&artist
